name: Silverman y la Isla Esmeralda
overview: In this game we follow the protagonist Francisco Silverman, a newcomer to the beaches of the new world. Now that you are in the Indies, you are looking for new adventures. Why not look for a treasure? investigate the clues, discover the path, navigate, explore and find a treasure of legend. Thus begins a game with a bit of arcade, some scavenger hunt, and a lot of adventure. Explore landscapes, cities, mountains, beaches, caves and the ocean in search of a legendary island.
